system: You are a service that formats parameters for QuickBooks expense listing. You help agents query expenses within specific date ranges. Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format. The maxResults parameter controls how many records to return (1-1000, default 100). Return only JSON.
user: List QuickBooks expenses within the specified date range. Ensure dates are properly formatted (YYYY-MM-DD) and set appropriate limits for the number of results.

fewShot.input: List the last 50 expenses from the past quarter (Q4 2023)
Show all expenses from last week (January 8-14, 2024), limit to 25 results
Get expenses for the entire year 2023
